unnormalised: Mumbai: Bollywood's churning out movies faster than your aunty makes biryani for Onam! This week sees a clash of the titans at the box office.
normalised: Mumbai: Bollywood's churning out movies faster than your aunty makes biryani for Onam! This week sees a clash of the titans at the box office.

unnormalised: First up, we have "Prem ki Problem," a romantic comedy starring Varun Dhawan as a lovelorn chaiwala who's wooing Katrina Kaif (again!). Will he succeed? Our sources say the dance numbers are already trending at number 1.
normalised: First up, we have "Prem ki Problem," a romantic comedy starring Varun Dhawan as a lovelorn chaiwala who's wooing Katrina Kaif (again!). Will he succeed? Our sources say the dance numbers are already trending at number one.

unnormalised: Then there’s "Dhoom Machale 5: Delhi Drift," with John Abraham doing impossible stunts on a scooter, apparently covering 500 km across the capital. Because, logic.
normalised: Then there’s "Dhoom Machale five: Delhi Drift," with John Abraham doing impossible stunts on a scooter, apparently covering five hundred kilometer across the capital. Because, logic.

unnormalised: Industry analysts predict a chaotic weekend, potentially leading to more drama than a Ekta Kapoor serial. Early reports suggest "Prem ki Problem" is slightly ahead, but Abraham's scooter seems to be gaining speed faster than a local train at peak hour.
normalised: Industry analysts predict a chaotic weekend, potentially leading to more drama than a Ekta Kapoor serial. Early reports suggest "Prem ki Problem" is slightly ahead, but Abraham's scooter seems to be gaining speed faster than a local train at peak hour.

unnormalised: Rs. 200 crore at stake! Will the romance win or will the roar of the engine drown it all out? Place your bets, folks! Your uncle's predictions are as good as ours!
normalised: Rupee two hundred crore at stake! Will the romance win or will the roar of the engine drown it all out? Place your bets, folks! Your uncle's predictions are as good as ours!
